item.title: 国际清算银行讨论终止普京希望削弱美元的项目
item.description: 国际清算银行（Bank for International Settlements）正在讨论是否关闭一个跨境支付试点平台，因为俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔-普京（Vladimir Putin）认为该平台的基础技术是规避制裁的工具，有可能削弱美元在全球金融体系中的主导地位。【原文：The Bank for International Settlements is debating whether to shut down a pilot cross-border payments platform after Russia‘s President Vladimir Putin identified the underlying technology as a tool to circumvent sanctions and potentially undermine the dollar’s dominance in the global financial system.】

item.title: 拍卖引发供应焦虑，国债收益率继续攀升
item.description: 美国政府债券收益率上升，原因是两场国债拍卖需求疲软，表明投资者在下一个融资季度前夕对供应感到焦虑。【原文：US government bond yields rose as weak demand for a pair of Treasury note auctions suggested investors are anxious about supply on the eve of the next financing quarter.】

item.title: 伊朗风险消退，石油大额看涨期权赌注化为乌有
item.description: 那些以创纪录的速度押注油价看涨期权的交易商们正被残酷的现实惊醒：这些合约现在大多一文不值。【原文：Traders who piled into bullish options bets on oil prices at record pace are waking up to a harsh reality: Most of those contracts are now worthless.】

item.title: EA 旗下 BioWare 期待新《龙腾世纪》游戏带来救赎
item.description:
这家曾经声名显赫的制片厂在经历了两部大失败之后需要一鸣惊人

。【原文：

The once prestigious studio needs a hit after two big flops

】

item.title: 通过高收益债券交易，私人飞机热潮涌入小额贷款市场
item.description: 百万航空（Million Air）是一家为超级富豪和高级管理人员提供服务的豪华航空公司，该公司正在向华尔街借款 1.205 亿美元，以扩大其在奥斯汀的业务，满足对停放私人飞机的机库空间的压抑需求。【原文：Million Air, a luxury aviation company catering to the ultra-rich and high-flying executives, is borrowing $120.5 million from Wall Street to expand its operations in Austin to meet pent-up demand for hangar space to park private jets.】

item.title: OpenAI 首席财务官称 75% 的收入来自付费消费者
item.description: OpenAI 首席财务官萨拉-弗里尔（Sarah Friar）说，OpenAI 的绝大部分收入来自为其产品付费的消费者。【原文：OpenAI generates the vast majority of its revenue from consumers who pay for its products, Chief Financial Officer Sarah Friar said, even as the artificial intelligence startup competes in a crowded market to sign up more corporate customers.】

item.title: Ancestry 称 23AndMe 收购将引发反垄断问题
item.description: Ancestry.com Inc.表示，由于反垄断原因，该公司很可能无法收购其在消费者基因检测行业的竞争对手23andMe Holding Co.。【原文：Ancestry.com Inc. said a hypothetical takeover of its flailing rival in the consumer genetic testing industry, 23andMe Holding Co., likely wouldn’t be possible for antitrust reasons.】

item.title: 墨西哥航空公司开始发行 11 亿美元 2027 年债券再融资
item.description: 墨西哥航空公司 Grupo Aeromexico SAB 正在利用私人债务市场筹集 11 亿美元，用于为 2027 年到期的票据再融资。【原文：Grupo Aeromexico SAB is tapping the private debt market to raise up to $1.1 billion that the Mexican airline will use to refinance notes due in 2027.】

item.title: Northvolt 的一轮救援融资有望于下周完成
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，瑞典的 Northvolt AB 公司很可能在下周完成一轮约 3 亿美元的预期融资，因为这家陷入困境的电池制造商正努力使其财务状况更加稳定。【原文：Sweden’s Northvolt AB is likely to complete an expected funding round of about $300 million next week, as the troubled battery-cell maker races to get its finances on a more stable footing, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 东芝力争到 2030 年实现两位数的功率芯片市场份额
item.description: 落后于竞争对手的东芝公司希望到 2030 年在全球功率芯片市场的份额达到两位数。【原文：Toshiba Corp. wants to reach double-digit market share in the world’s power chip market by 2030 as it lags behind rivals.】

item.title: 法国巴黎银行据称将裁减信贷销售和交易部门的大量人员
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，法国巴黎银行上周在纽约解雇了至少六名员工，其中包括其美国高收益交易主管大卫-马尔文（David Malvern）。【原文：BNP Paribas SA let go at least half a dozen employees in New York last week, including its head of US high-yield trading, David Malvern, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 丰业银行经济学家称特朗普胜选将带来 "破坏性 "政策
item.description: 一位加拿大顶级经济学家警告说，唐纳德-特朗普的第二个总统任期很可能会带来极端保护主义、巨大的人口负面冲击以及为 "完全无纪律的财政政策 "提供资金的债务发行激增。【原文：A second presidential term for Donald Trump would likely bring about extreme protectionism, a large negative population shock and a surge of debt issuance to fund “totally undisciplined fiscal policy,” a top Canadian economist warned.】

item.description:

item.title: 欧洲央行加快降息，交易员寻求 3750 万欧元发薪日
item.description: 一位交易员正在下巨额赌注，赌欧洲央行将加快降息步伐，以支撑该地区的经济。【原文：One trader is wagering huge sums that the European Central Bank will quicken the pace of interest-rate cuts to prop up the region’s economy.】

item.title: 安费诺利用债务市场为 CommScope 收购案融资
item.description: 电缆、传感器和天线等设备制造商安费诺公司计划周一出售投资级债券，以帮助支付该公司收购 CommScope Holding Co.【原文：Amphenol Corp., a maker of equipment including cable, sensors and antennas, is planning to sell investment-grade bonds Monday to help pay for the company’s acquisition of CommScope Holding Co.’s outdoor wireless networks and distributed antenna systems.】

item.title: The Information 称 Meta 正在开发自己的人工智能搜索引擎
item.description: 据 Information 周一报道，Facebook 的所有者 Meta Platforms 公司正在开发一种搜索引擎，这种搜索引擎可以在网络上抓取信息，并通过其人工智能聊天机器人提供给人们。【原文：Facebook owner Meta Platforms Inc. is working on developing a search engine that crawls the web for information to provide to people using its AI chatbot, the Information reported Monday.】

item.title: 英国生育率降至 1938 年有记录以来最低点
item.description: 2023 年，英格兰威尔士的生育率降至历史最低点，原因是经济压力和更广泛的社会变革使年轻人不再愿意组建家庭。【原文：The fertility rate in England Wales fell to a record low in 2023, as financial pressures and wider societal shifts put young people off starting a family.】

item.title: 苹果在推出配备 M4 芯片的新款 iMac 的同时推出人工智能平台
item.description: 苹果公司开始推出首批苹果智能功能，并发布了配备更快的人工智能 M4 处理器的全新 24 英寸 iMac 台式机。【原文：Apple Inc. started rolling out its first set of Apple Intelligence features and unveiled a new 24-inch iMac desktop with a faster, AI-focused M4 processor.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利称萨尔瓦多债券反弹高潮已过
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）对萨尔瓦多债务持中性态度，认为在近几个月反弹 20% 之后，上涨空间不大。【原文：Morgan Stanley has turned neutral on El Salvador debt, arguing that there’s little room for gains after a 20% rally in recent months.】

item.title: 政治存在经济学问题
item.description: 大家好，欢迎阅读《奇点》时事通讯，它是来自《奇点》世界的每日内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 库奇内利称奢侈品集团在中国采取的 "慢 "策略将有助于保护品牌
item.description: 奢华羊绒制造商布鲁内罗-库奇内利公司（Brunello Cucinelli SpA）正在中国采取缓慢的新开店策略，以保护该品牌的声誉。【原文：Luxury cashmere maker Brunello Cucinelli SpA is taking a go-slow approach to new openings in China as it looks to protect the brand’s cachet.】

item.title: 比特币交易员重新关注 70,000 美元，现金流入 ETF
item.description: 在加密货币周五晚些时候短暂全线下挫、美国交易所交易基金继续保持稳定流入之后，比特币交易商再次瞄准了上次在6月份达到的70,000美元价格水平。【原文：Bitcoin traders are targeting the $70,000 price level last reached in June once again after cryptocurrencies briefly dipped across the board late Friday and US exchange-traded funds continued to see steady inflows.】

item.title: Janus 和哥伦比亚公司在大选前关注被打压的抵押贷款债务
item.description: 债券市场的日益动荡和对美国通胀上升的担忧对机构抵押债券的打击尤为严重。对于 Janus Henderson 和 Columbia Threadneedle Investments 的投资者来说，这种疲软可能会带来买入这些证券的机会。【原文：Growing turmoil in the bond market and fears of rising US inflation are hitting agency mortgage bonds particularly hard. To investors at Janus Henderson and Columbia Threadneedle Investments, this weakness could present opportunities to buy the securities.】

item.title: 美国陆军与科技公司合作加速武器研发
item.description: 美国陆军参谋长在接受采访时说，美国陆军正在寻求加快武器研发和采购速度，以跟上不断发展的技术，并确保新装备在进入美国士兵手中之前不会过时。【原文：The US Army is looking to speed up weapons development and procurement to keep up with evolving technology and make sure new equipment isn’t out of date before it gets into the hands of American soldiers, the Army chief of staff said in an interview.】

item.title: 雅德尼认为美国和英国准备出售债券，债券守夜人正在集结
item.description: 华尔街资深人士埃德-亚德尼（Ed Yardeni）说，随着美国财政部准备新的债务发行计划，美国大选的临近可能预示着市场上债券守夜人的回归。【原文：Wall Street veteran Ed Yardeni says the approaching US election could augur the return of the market’s bond vigilantes as the Treasury Department readies new debt issuance plans.】

item.title: 红迪网高歌猛进，盈利面临人工智能培训数据考验
item.description: Reddit 公司的股价自今年早些时候上市以来一路高歌猛进，这家社交媒体公司在人工智能领域的独特地位将决定涨势是否会继续。【原文：Reddit Inc. shares have been on a tear since going public earlier this year, and the social-media company’s unique place in the artificial intelligence landscape will dictate whether the rally continues.】

item.title: 供过于求，德国将削减部分太阳能发电场补贴
item.description: 在可再生能源电力供过于求导致政府成本上升之后，德国计划缩小有资格获得补贴的太阳能生产商的范围。【原文：Germany plans to narrow the pool of solar producers that are eligible for subsidies after an oversupply of renewable power has led to rising costs for the government.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚自四月以来首次利用全球债券市场
item.description: 哥伦比亚今年第二次重返国际债务市场，正在考验投资者对其美元债券的胃口。【原文：Colombia is testing investor appetite for its dollar bonds, returning to international debt markets for the second time this year.】

item.title: 初创公司 Armis 着眼于 2026 年上市，以 46 亿美元估值完成一轮融资
item.description: 美国网络安全初创公司 Armis 周一表示，在完成一轮 2 亿美元的融资（估值 42 亿美元）后，该公司正准备在 2026 年进行首次公开募股。【原文：US cybersecurity startup Armis said Monday that it’s preparing for an initial public offering in 2026 after closing a $200 million funding round that valued it at $4.2 billion.】

item.title: 米莱改革使阿根廷债务摆脱困境
item.description: 随着哈维尔-米莱总统以其重塑南美第二大经济体的计划赢得债券市场的青睐，投资者不再押注阿根廷将不可避免地走向违约。【原文：Investors are no longer betting Argentina is heading inevitably to default as President Javier Milei wins over bond markets with his plans to remake South America’s second-largest economy.】
